item.title: US-285 North/US-84 West at NM-30
item.description: US-285 North/US-84 West at NM-30 south.

item.title: US-84 West/US-285 North Approaching NM-30
item.description: US-84 West/US-285 North approaching NM-30. Use NM-30 south for Santa Clara Pueblo, and San Ildefonso Pueblo. Continue on US-84 West/US-285 North for Chama and Tierra Amarilla.

item.title: NM-502 East Approaching NM-30
item.description: NM-502 East approaching NM-30. Use NM-30 north for Espa√±ola; continue east on NM-502 for Santa Fe.

item.title: End NM-30 South at NM-520
item.description: End NM-30 South at NM-520. Use NM-520 west for Los Alamos; use NM-520 east for Santa Fe.

item.title: Route Diagram on NM-30 Approaching NM-502
item.description: Route Diagram on NM-30 south approaching NM-502. Use NM-502 west for Los Alamos; use NM-502 east for Santa Fe.
